original_text: Then David went over to the other side, and stood on the top of an hill afar off; a great space being between them:
korean_text: 이에 다윗이 건너편으로 가서 멀리 산 꼭대기에 서니 거리가 멀더라

sentences.original_text: Then David went over to the other side
and stood on the top of an hill afar off
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 멀리 떨어진 언덕 꼭대기에 섰습니다

sentences.original_text: a great space being between them
